adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: mistral-group-1

model.title: Model
model.description: Provide the model name. Examples: mistral-large-latest, mistral-small-latest, magistral-medium-2506, magistral-small-2506

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: API Key for Mistral AI LLM

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries to attempt when a request fails.

max_tokens.title: Maximum Output Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of output tokens to limit LLM replies, the maximum possible differs from model to model.

enable_reasoning.title: Enable Reasoning
enable_reasoning.description: Enable reasoning capabilities for Magistral models (magistral-medium-2506, magistral-small-2506). Provides step-by-step reasoning for complex tasks.

reasoning_effort.title: Reasoning Effort
reasoning_effort.description: Controls the depth of reasoning. Higher values provide more thorough analysis but may increase latency and cost.
